result.eng: The river runs through the city.
result.ga: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathair
result.orig: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathair
result.html: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathairThe river runs through the city.
result.ponchtml: Riṫeann an aḃainn tríd an ċaṫairThe river runs through the city.

result.eng: I've been in the city for ten years.
result.ga: Tá mé sa chathair le deich mbliana anuas
result.orig: Tá mé sa chathair le deich mbliana anuas
result.html: Tá mé sa chathair le deich mbliana anuasI've been in the city for ten years.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sa ċaṫair le deiċ mbliana anuasI've been in the city for ten years.

result.eng: Where do you live in the city?
result.ga: Cá bhfuil tú i do chónaí sa chathair
result.orig: Cá bhfuil tú i do chónaí sa chathair
result.html: Cá bhfuil tú i do chónaí sa chathairWhere do you live in the city?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil tú i do ċónaí sa ċaṫairWhere do you live in the city?

result.eng: I live in the city and I love the area.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí sa chathair agus is breá liom an ceantar
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí sa chathair agus is breá liom an ceantar
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí sa chathair agus is breá liom an ceantarI live in the city and I love the area.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí sa ċaṫair agus is breá liom an ceantarI live in the city and I love the area.

result.eng: It's beside the sea but close to the city as well.
result.ga: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisin
result.orig: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisin
result.html: Tá sé cois farraige ach gar don chathair freisinIt's beside the sea but close to the city as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé cois farraige aċ gar don ċaṫair freisinIt's beside the sea but close to the city as well.

result.eng: I visited the city in the eighties.
result.ga: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidí
result.orig: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidí
result.html: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidíI visited the city in the eighties.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cuairt ar an ċaṫair sna hoċtóidíI visited the city in the eighties.

result.eng: There is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.
result.ga: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair Bhoston
result.orig: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair Bhoston
result.html: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair BhostonThere is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanreilig i lár ċaṫair ḂostonThere is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.
